Question: Shenzhen NED Optics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen NED Optics Co., Ltd.

Product: Optoelectronic products and solutions

- Specializes in optoelectronic supply chain, including chips, components, devices, and equipment
- Exhibits at the China International Optoelectronic Exposition (CIOE)
- Offers a holistic one-stop sourcing platform for global professionals to source cutting-edge products and meet qualified Chinese suppliers
